item.title: Elon Musk asks court to block OpenAI from converting to a for-profit
item.description: Elon Musk seeks to block OpenAI from changing its business structure, and discouraging deals to back competitors like xAI.

item.title: Trump nominates loyalist Kash Patel to serve as FBI director
item.description: Patel, who still must be confirmed by the Senate, has promoted the false claims that the 2020 election was stolen and that a secret “deep state” cabal...

item.title: Wall Street kicks off December with jobs data on tap and S&P 500 looking to enter history books
item.description: Stocks are at or near all-time highs as investors turn the page to December.

item.title: Connecticut's Congress members targeted with bomb threats on Thanksgiving
item.description: Five of the state's seven Democratic members of Congress said they were notified of bomb threats targeting their homes, but no devices were found.

item.title: Biden says Trump's tariff threat against Canada and Mexico is 'counterproductive'
item.description: Biden said that he hopes Trump "rethinks" his tariff announcement, which would impact two close U.S. allies.
